title: Scaling Node.js Architecture for Enterprise
description: Learn how to structure your Node.js applications to handle millions of requests. We will cover microservices, caching strategies, and load balancing.

title: Modern CSS Layouts: Mastering Grid & Subgrid
description: Stop fighting with floats and positioning. Discover the power of CSS Grid and the new Subgrid feature to build complex, responsive layouts with ease.

title: Lunch Break
description: Enjoy a catered lunch and network with other attendees.

title: Securing Your Web Applications in 2026
description: A deep dive into common vulnerabilities (OWASP Top 10) and modern mitigation techniques. Ensure your user data remains safe.

title: The State of WebAssembly
description: WebAssembly is changing how we run high-performance code in the browser. See practical examples of image processing and game development.

title: Optimizing Database Queries
description: Slow queries kill performance. We'll explore indexing, query planning, and common pitfalls in SQL and NoSQL databases.

title: Building Accessible UIs for Everyone
description: Accessibility is not a feature, it's a requirement. Learn semantic HTML, ARIA roles, and how to test your site for screen readers.
